PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-11442020-12-24,  ,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of PHILIPPE RABOT, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), for the period he acted as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (National Affairs) in the Montréal Regional Office, commencing on May 13, 2019 and ending on December 1, 2019; fixing his remuneration and certain conditions of employment for the period he is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Ottawa District Office), effective December 2, 2019, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Ottawa District Office); and approving his assignment by the Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board of PHILIPPE RABOT to the Ottawa District Office, effective March 31, 2020.
AttachmentsAttachment
